product_name: REI Heavyweight Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Winter is no match for the women's REI Heavyweight Half-Zip Long Underwear Top. Polyester fleece traps heat close to the body so you stay warm while skiing, hiking or running in cold temperatures. Lightweight, breathable polyester features a fleeced interior to trap body heat and circulate it next to skin for lasting warmth. Half-zip opening allows easy ventilation when you start to overheat. Long underwear top can also be worn as an outer layer in mild weather; a durable water repellent finish sheds light rain. Special buy.
